channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-7173] Support HIVE-4867 on mapjoin of MR Tasks
item.description: HIVE-4867 dedups columns in RS for reducer join and RS for order-by. But small aliases of mapjoin of MR tasks still contains key columns in value exprs.
item.summary: Support HIVE-4867 on mapjoin of MR Tasks

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
